title: Chinese fried rice
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon Chinese oil (see footnote)', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 small onion, diced', '1 cupful of cold pre-cooked long grain rice', '1 tablespoon frozen peas, defrosted', '1 teaspoon dark soy sauce', '1 teaspoon light soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon sugar', '1/4 teaspoon MSG', '1 small pinch white pepper', '1 teaspoon sesame oil']
